report.title: Child samples list with transect - Dunescape
report.description: A general purpose list of Dunescape samples with parent sample ID and transect name.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional s JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=s.id LEFT JOIN locations lc ON lc.id=s.location_id AND lc.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations lp ON lp.id=lc.parent_id AND lp.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_samples_functional sp on sp.id=s.parent_sample_id LEFT JOIN locations lsp ON lsp.id=sp.location_id AND lsp.deleted=false #joins# WHERE #website_filter# #filters#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include
